title: Do more of what makes you happy. FONT ID
content:
Does anyone know this font? First thought was Avant Garde, but it isn't.

Font: 

 Code Pro 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123736/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [do-more\_-geometric.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123736/http:/typophile.com/files/do-more_-geometric.jpg) | 66.82 KB |
author: K.P.

comments.content:
**[Code Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123736/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Fontfabric%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Code%20Pro%20-%20Regular&fid=69772f9cb2cdecfdee9f6d5a90425514&fsize=60&text=DO%20MORE%20OF%20WHAT%20MAKES%20YOU%20HAPPY&wrap=2)** by Svetoslav Simov [Fontfabric, 2011]  
There is also a **[Code Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123736/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=Code%20Bold%20-%20Regular&fid=f6a87faebf080792930595084ea56812&fsize=60&text=DO%20MORE%20OF%20WHAT%20MAKES%20YOU%20HAPPY&wrap=2)** version which is free.
